Hasun is an artist who works with both painting and drawing to create art that draws on societal approaches to abstraction. She is interested in collaborating with fields like psychology and sociology to create works that benefit marginalized communities. Hasun is particularly fascinated by how abstraction has evolved in contemporary art movements and prefers it because it allows artists to express their perspectives in a lively way. She experiments with various materials to explore geometric abstraction.
Hasun earned a BFA in Woodworking&Furniture Design and Visual Communication Design from Hongik University in Seoul, and now works as a product designer at NAVER corporation in South Korea.
